abstract: New details emerge in fatal police shooting of Pasco, Wash, man Antonio Zambrano-Montes; police say Zambrano-Montes had been struggling emotionally and behaving erratically due to his split from his wife and children; he had also not been seen for two weeks prior to fatal incident.
lead_paragraph: A spokesman from the investigations unit examining the case said the man killed last week by Pasco, Wash., officers, Antonio Zambrano-Montes, had not been seen for two weeks by his family.

headline.main: New Details Revealed in Shooting by Police in Washington State
headline.print_headline: A Few More Details Emerge About a Police Shooting in Washington State

snippet: A spokesman from the investigations unit examining the case said the man killed last week by Pasco, Wash., officers, Antonio Zambrano-Montes, had not been seen for two weeks by his family.
